articles.title: Mathys Tel transfer news: Tottenham Hotspur complete £30m signing of Bayern Munich forward on six-year deal
articles.description: Forward Mathys Tel has moved to Tottenham permanently from Bayern Munich on six-year deal worth £29.8m; France U21 international had joined Spurs on loan in January, scoring three goals in 20 appearances; Spurs paid an original £7.3m loan fee; deal given approval by Thomas Frank
articles.content:
Tottenham have confirmed the signing of Bayern Munich forward Mathys Tel in a deal worth £29.8 million, with the France U21 international signing a six-year contract at the north London club until 2031.
Tel was originally signed on loan with a view o... [2916 chars]

articles.description: The property is on the market for offers of €1,695,000 and over.
articles.content:
